dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT a.device_id, a.device_name, a.group_name, a.party_name, a.asset_number, b.previous_bill_count, b.total_count, b.previous_count, (b.total_count-b.previous_count) current_usage_count FROM xx_cs_mps_device_details b, xx_cs_mps_device_b a WHERE b.device_id=a.device_id AND b.usage_billed='N' ORDER BY 1
